entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use two SQL Server database tables (localhost) at the same time? #25752
  • Owned entity marked as "Deleted" do not show up in their Owners "References" collection #25750
  • Cosmos: `Dictionary<int, string>` properties do not generate any errors, but don't map correctly #25749
  • Mapping attribute to configure a temporal table #25743
  • NotMapped composed property causes all properties load in select statement in EF Core #25742

Closed

  • Cosmos: persist Guids as strings by default #25753
    6.0.0
  • LazyLoaded Properties are not Obfuscator-safe #25720
  • Can't create tables in sqlite file #25694
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert #25712
    6.0.0
  • Frequent deadlocks on concurrent inserts with identity columns #25345
    6.0.0
  • Conversion errors in debugger are unhelpful #25600
  • Conditionally mapping two entities to a base entity #25517
  • "Foreign keys are both mapped to <Table> but referencing different principal tables" on long entity names #25456
  • Runtime Exception when passing Func<Entity, bool> into Filtered Include #25733
  • FK constraint failed when re-adding entity #21949
    6.0.0
  • [Cosmos] ISO date time strings are not read back correctly from the database #25656
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Required navigation properties switched to nullable/restrict delete behavior #24215
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Incorrect behavior of classes with the same name #23981
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query: NRE when trying to project count of navigation typed as ICollection<T> #22701
    6.0.0-rc2
  • TPH inheritance with two properties mapped to the same column but different nullability is not allowed #21384
    6.0.0-rc2
  • efcore and odata: the EDM instance of type [some-type] is missing the property [some-property] #19927
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migrations: Problem with 3 nested levels of owned type properties #25704

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly handle adding optional dependents using table splitting without principal. #25757
  • Resiliency to columns with missing types in SQL Server scaffolding #25748
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25744
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Cosmos: Remove Guid type mapping #25755
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert with non-identity store-generated key #25718
  • Detatching principal keeps track of unreferenced dependents #25702
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25723
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: Disable DateTime string parsing #25741
  • Allow sharing column when properties have different nullability. #25740
  • Adding some regression tests for issues fixed earlier #25736
  • Configure ambiguous navigations with RequiredAttribute #25737
    auto-merge
  • Metadata: Avoid sharing default mappings for entity types #25734
